Sprite Class

class Sprite(WorldObject)

A class representing a sprite in the game world.

offset

The x-offset of the sprite.

offset_y

The y-offset of the sprite.

sprite

The sprite information for the object.

hit

A boolean indicating whether the sprite has been hit.

__init__(name, x, y)

Initializes a Sprite.

Parameters:

  • name – The name of the sprite.

  • x – The x-offset of the sprite.

  • y – The y-offset of the sprite.

is_hooker()

Checks if the sprite represents a “hooker”.

Returns:

True if the sprite is a “hooker,” False otherwise.

is_speed_boost()

Checks if the sprite represents a “speed boost.”

Returns:

True if the sprite is a “speed boost,” False otherwise.

is_bonus()

Checks if the sprite represents a “bonus.”

Returns:

True if the sprite is a “bonus,” False otherwise.

path()

Retrieves the image path for the sprite.

Returns:

The image path as a pygame Surface.
